name: Down to the Wire (David Styrbjörn)
description:
Down to the Wire

Down to the Wire is a timed puzzle game about fixing a set of electrical circuits before catastrophe occurs. Use your wits to keep the remaining time in check and reach the final stage. Should the timer run out, you’re out and have to start all over again.

Each stage is composed of a set of lamps. Your primary objective is to turn each lamp green.

Hot tip:

Input a desired screen name at the title screen for a chance to be displayed on the leaderboard, should you reach the end.

Move: WASD.

Retry stage: R

CREDITS:
